name: Blood And Gore
description:
You control a one-handed hero, and beat up an unending horde of demonic crabs. Keep up the fun!

Controls
  • Movement with WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Drop weapon with Q.
  • Shoot with Left Click or Left Control.
  • Pick up items by running at them.
  • Have fun to keep playing.
  • Shoot crabs to have fun!

Game made by Teascade and Neon for GMTK Jam 2019. Browse the Unity project on our Git.

Feel free to donate how much you want, but we recommend the default: $1/person/day.
